sentences.en: As she turned back, a movement across the lawn caught her eye.
sentences.cn: 她转过身，瞥见有个东西从草地上穿了过去。

sentences.en: He continued to mow the lawn and do other routine chores.
sentences.cn: 他继续剪草坪，并做些其他日常杂务。

sentences.en: He was on the front lawn, measuring out two circles.
sentences.cn: 他在前面的草坪上丈量并标记出两个圆圈。

sentences.en: I spent all morning mowing the lawn (= cutting the grass ).
sentences.cn: 我整个上午都在修剪草坪。

sentences.en: Lenny moved swiftly and silently across the front lawn.
sentences.cn: 伦尼悄无声息地快速穿过房前的草坪。

sentences.en: Scatter the grass seed over the lawn.
She ran swiftly over the lawn to the gate.
sentences.cn: 她一溜烟穿过草地跑到了大门口。

sentences.en: She swivelled her chair round and stared out across the back lawn.
sentences.cn: 她把椅子转过来，向外凝视着屋后的草坪。

sentences.en: The Lawn Tennis Association suspended Mr Castle from the British team.
sentences.cn: 草地网球协会暂停了卡斯尔先生在英国队的职务。

sentences.en: The typical lawn mower makes about 90 decibels of noise.
sentences.cn: 典型的割草机发出的声响约为90分贝.

sentences.en: The windows overlooked a lawn of tall waving grass.
sentences.cn: 窗户外边是一块草地，高高的草随风摇摆。

sentences.en: There were ducks quacking on the lawn.
sentences.cn: 草地上有几只鸭子在嘎嘎叫。

sentences.en: They are camped out in tents on the front lawn.
sentences.cn: 他们在门前的草坪上支起帐篷宿营了。

sentences.en: They were sitting on the lawn under a large beech tree.
sentences.cn: 他们坐在一棵高大的山毛榉树下的草坪上。

sentences.en: We have ordered several turfs to make our lawn.
sentences.cn: 我们订购了一些草皮块铺个草坪.

sentences.en: You can engage in croquet on the south lawn.
sentences.cn: 你可以参加南边草坪上的槌球游戏。

trans.tran_en: an area of ground in a garden or park that is covered with short grass
